動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍雞痘活毒疫苗(DCEP25株)
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 雞及火雞：預防感染雞痘。
ingredients: ACH DOSE CONTAINS：FOWL POX VIRUS, DCEP25 MODIFIED STRAIN, AT LEAST  10^3 CCID50FREEZE DRYING STABILIZER(*), Q.S. TO  1 DOSE *COMPOSITION OF STABILIZER BEFORE FREEZE-DRYING：SUCROSE  100MGLACTALBUMINE HYDROLYSATE  50MGSODIUM GLUTAMATE  12.5MGWATER FOR INJECTION  1ML稀釋液：GLYCEROL  1MGSALINE SOLUTION(**), Q.S. TO  0.01ML**COMPOSITION OF SALINE SOLUTION：SODIUM CHLORIDE  9MGWATER FOR INJECTION, Q.S. TO  1ML
